```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_violin(aes(fill = species))+
  theme_classic()+
  labs(x = "Penguin Species",
       y = "Body Mass (g)")+
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
